1.title: Elephants, Cats & Octopuses

episode of.title: Everything You Didn't Know About Animals (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Explore the towering elephant, the elusive octopus, and king of cuteness, the house cat. Would you believe that an elephant can hear through its feet? Did you know that every one of an octopus's suckers has the ability to taste? And how can the purr of a cat help astronauts travel to Mars? Uncover a world of fascinating facts about these remarkable animals.

2.title: Lions, Owls & Frogs

episode of.title: Everything You Didn't Know About Animals (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Uncover the secrets of the majestic lion, the adaptable frog, and the king of nighttime stealth, the owl. Did you know lions could count? Would you believe there's a frog with see-through skin? Discover how the owl's iconic face helps this bird hear the footsteps of a mouse a quarter of a mile away and learn the secret to how the owl appears to spin its head all the way around.

3.title: Pigs, Wolves & Crows

episode of.title: Everything You Didn't Know About Animals (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Join us as we reveal mind-blowing facts about the all-too-human pig, the voracious wolf and the Einstein of birds -- the crow.

4.title: Polar Bears, Dogs & Mantis Shrimp

episode of.title: Everything You Didn't Know About Animals (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Explore amazing facts about the ravenous polar bear, the super-powered dog, and the mighty mantis shrimp. Would you believe that you can teach a dog to drive? And how can a 4-inch-long crustacean revolutionize aircraft design and save soldiers on the battlefield? We're revealing a world of fascinating facts about these remarkable animals. Plus, discover the secrets of the "pizzly bear" - a shocking union of polar bears and grizzlies.

5.title: Tigers, Rhinos & Naked Mole Rats

episode of.title: Everything You Didn't Know About Animals (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Discover a world of fascinating facts about the surprisingly agile rhino and the stealthy and powerful tiger. And, take a look at some very unusual animal-related laws.

6.title: Orangs, Raccoons & Cool Cats

episode of.title: Everything You Didn't Know About Animals (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Uncover mind-blowing facts about orangutans, the wily raccoon and some very cool cats.

imdb.plot outline: Did you know a cat's purr could help keep astronauts alive in space, or that dogs can drive? EVERYTHING YOU DIDN'T KNOW ABOUT ANIMALS aims to surprise, entertain, and inform with never before heard, water-cooler worthy facts about your favorite animals.
